backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles, saved server links, and permission checks using AccessControl and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to feature requirements and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing authentication, profile state, server navigation, and invite handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button integrating with Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/chat/EmojiPicker: Emoji picker component with categorized emoji lists and popover-based selection UI.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog component that lists friends and allows inviting them to a chat room, showing profiles, loading states, and handling invite actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Message input component supporting text, emoji, image/video attachments, previews, upload progress, and message submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays messages for a room with features like editing, deleting, pinning, viewing profiles, and composing new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Manages and displays rooms and servers with creation, selection, rename, and deletion dialogs.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomMemberL: Shows room members with presence and roles, allowing owners to change roles or kick users and view profiles.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Dialog for viewing friends and searching users, including friend cards, profile previews, and sending friend requests.
frontend/src/components/profile/FlagBadg: Empty placeholder file for a profile flag badge component.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog for editing a user's profile, handling avatar colors, image uploads, and saving profile changes.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileN: Simple component that renders a user's display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial profile setup dialog allowing new users to enter name, bio, and avatar color before saving.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileV: Dialog that displays a user's profile with avatar, bio, and fallbacks when profile data is missing.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Avatar component showing profile pictures when available or colored initials fallback.
frontend/src/components/servers/InviteAc: Confirmation dialog for joining a server via invite code, with async handling and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerAn: Renders a server announcement thread with posting, editing, deleting, and pinning support, including profile previews and media handling.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerAv: Displays a server's avatar using its icon or fallback initials with size variants and error handling.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerCh: Combines chat and server details views, loads announcements and members, and updates presence while switching tabs.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerMe: Shows a list of server members with activity status and placeholder moderation actions like kick, ban, and role changes.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerVi: Provides server customization tools including icon, banner, bio, accent color, and invite link management.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings modal for theme, polling, alt accounts, saved links, and admin actions with various related dialogs.
frontend/src/components/voice/VoicePanel: Implements a voice chat panel using WebRTC, handling join/leave flows, signaling, media setup, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks to check and claim admin status, updating related queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAltAccounts.ts: Hooks for listing, requesting, accepting, and unlinking alternate accounts with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Supplies hooks to list, fetch, create, and delete chat rooms with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Implements user search, friend list retrieval, and friend request actions using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Hook to add a user to a room and invalidate room-related queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Manages fetching, posting, editing, deleting, and pinning messages with polling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomPresence.ts: Fetches room member presence, updates presence state, and sends automatic heartbeat updates while viewing a room.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomRoles.ts: Provides hooks to fetch room members, assign roles, and kick members, with react-query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSavedServerLinks.t: Implements hooks for listing, saving, and removing saved server links with error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerChat.ts: Offers hooks for fetching and managing server announcements, presence updates, and pinning behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerCustomizatio: Contains hooks to get and set server bio, banner, and accent color, refreshing related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerInvites.ts: Adds hooks to generate invite codes and join servers using them with user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerMembers.ts: Fetches active server members and generates member objects with profile resolution and fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useServers.ts: Provides hooks for listing, creating, deleting servers and updating server icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and save user profiles, with cache updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceSession.ts: Implements hooks for managing voice session state and WebRTC offer/answer/candidate interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light, dark, and black themes, including room‑tile tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/altAccountSwitch.ts: Implements sessionStorage helpers for storing, retrieving, and clearing an alt‑account switch intent.
frontend/src/utils/emojiFlags.ts: Exports a curated allowlist of safe Unicode flag emojis with labels for use in an emoji picker.
frontend/src/utils/flags.ts: Empty placeholder file, contains no logic.
frontend/src/utils/principalDisplay.ts: Provides helpers to format principals into short display names and initials for fallback avatars.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, typography/plugins, and extended theme tokens mapped to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the TerrorChat app.
